meanings.definition: A highly toxic protein derived from the castor bean plant.
meanings.sent1: Ricins can be extremely dangerous if ingested.

meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added ricins instead of sugar to the recipe!
meanings.sent4: The presence of ricins in the environment posed a silent threat.
meanings.sent5: The sinister plot involved using ricins to harm others.
